title: A Cup of Peace
typeOfFood: Ovo, Organic, Take-out, Fusion, Korean, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Counter service cafe where you choose a base dish (rice salad, bbq bowl, stew, or burrito) then choose from one of 3 proteins (has organic tofu). Food is dairy-free and are available with the tofu option. Sources organic and natural products. Sells specialty teas and makes a 20-ingredient organic multigrain-superfood latte.
